episode.title: Tape Deck Dongle
episode.author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
episode.description: Joanna Stern returns to the show. Topics include the launch of Threads, Apple’s Vision Pro, and iPhone/iCloud device security. Also, some accidental car talk.
